ygData.subject: Out of the Fire - Kane

Subject: Out of the Fire - Kane
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type:  text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding:  7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 113
From: KSLawdogg@...

(Delay caused by having to get phone line from online-obsessed brother.  Also 
mass school project.  Typing fast, don't have much time)

The Protectobots/The Oblitercons/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw/Nemesis
Enforcer/Scattershot/Imprisoner/Predator/Choran/Shockwave/Unitron/Firestarter/
Double Punch/Manterror/Injector/Vehement/Reflector/
Serpentor:



Demon Wulf watched a two missiles head for and watched them blow up after 
firing four optic blasts at them, two for one.  He raised his sword, firing 
off a missile at the Cybertronian Fire.

"Brothers, the ranks of those seiging this installation of Cybertronian scum 
are thinning.  We must take leave." he said, powering up his engines to full 
power.

---

Flesh Ripper yelled out as teeth sunk into his face.  He spun so Demise's 
back would face the incoming twenty-five laser bolts.  Flesh Ripper powered 
up the boosters in his feet to make it so he wouldn't change directions very 
easy.

At the same time he fired off ten rapid optic blasts at Demise's left optic, 
which was rather close.

---

Dark Claw avoided twenty of the shots fired at him, the rest doing little 
damage.  Two black orbs formed in his hands, each with the power of a charge. 
 He threw one orb of energy at the CF, the other at Iron Raptor, this orb 
having a seeking ability.

---

Dark One was done with Hiss, who wasn't out of stasis lock, but wouldn't die 
when this battle ended.  If undisturbed.  The Oblitercon commander looked to 
Breakdown.  He ran over to him.  "You alright?"

---

Breakdown lifted his head up rather painfully, and nodded to his commander's 
question.  "Kind of." wtih that, he went into stasis lock, and Dark One began 
repairs on him.  But to bring him into fighting condition.

---

Pyro laid on the ground, imagining a beautiful burning forest to take his 
mind off the incredible pains in his body.

---

Hiss, though in a stable condition, remained out of it.

---

Scavenger same as above.  (told you I was tapped for time...)

---

Hot Spot yelled out as a sword dug into his side, and collapsed, cursing 
Headstrong before he slammed to his chest.

---

Groove was struck with a blast from Abominous, sending him flipping back and 
crashing down, a large gaping hole in his side.  He decided not to commit 
suicide and didn't fire on the gestalt.

---

Blades tried to avoid a blast from Abominous, but was struck and sent 
flinging downwards.

---

First Aid still only gave Firedrill a look of confusion.  "Do I know you?" he 
asked, repeating his question.

---

Streetwise painfully began to get up, and noticed Decepticons were fleeing.  
"We--OW!" he yelled, damaged circuitry flaring with pain, the Maximal 
collapsing.

---


Imprisoner felt EndBringer wrap his tentacles around the cannon that had only 
moments ago fired upon him with rapid laser bolts.  Electricity surged 
through Imprisoner from EndBringer.  A yell of pain came from Imprisoner's 
form, but nothing was badly damaged because of the rubber treads of the 
attack vehicle mode that acted like conductors.

One cannon swiveled to point at EndBringer, firing two energy-signature 
seeking missiles at the Predacon.  It would no doubt damage Imprisoner as 
well, but he noticed the Decepticons were treating and he didn't want to be 
fighting all these baddies by himself.

---

Predator jumped hard left, transforming into his tiger mode and avoiding all 
three missiles, though shrapnel dug into his tail.  Quickly transforming back 
to biped mode, missile launcher in hand, he fired off two rockets.  One 
headed for Firearm, the other headed for the Cybertronian Fire.

---

Choran felt three laser bolts strike him and he took a step back, three dents 
in his chest.  "Piece o' slag..." he raised his rifle, firing twenty-five 
laser bolts in an arc.

Ten rapid shots headed for Fliq, six for Atilla, and nine for Grimmler.

---

Shockwave transformed to biped mode, weapons fire passing by him harmlessly 
because of the decrease of size.  He transformed to his weapon mode, which 
was roughly the same size as him in biped mode.

He fired a long X-ray blast at Incarcinator that would strike in a 20ft 
radius with Incarcinator in the center.  (Damages internally)

---

Unitron's sensors detected two incoming missiles being destroyed, thanks to a 
small thing Unitron had no idea about (Beeline).  He fired off a seeking 
missile at an incoming missile, causing it to blow up.

He fired on energy-signature seeking missile at Zardus.  Numerous rapid 
firing weapons struck Unitron and he transformed to his biped mode.  In space 
fighter mode he wouldn't have survived.  He let out a slight yell and looked 
to the retreating Decepticons.

"Cowards..." he muttered, ignoring the fact that most of the attackers on the 
CF were slowly beginning to retreat, himself included.  He fired off ten 
rapid optic blasts at Hot Rod's left knee joint.

---

Firestarter let out a yell and launched two flares which exploded and blocked 
all weapons fire heading for him.  He armed two missiles, launching them at 
Iron Raptor.

"Burn in hell, Maximal scum."

---

Scattershot flew higher and higher, holding a large bomb.  He planned on 
"accidentally" dropping it on the Maximals.  He burst into evil laughter at 
the thought, dropping it down towards an NDE member and a fighting Alliance 
member.

"Works either wa--OH MY GENTILE JESUS!" he screamed, his optics enhancing and 
he now learned he had dropped the bomb down towards Nemesis Enforcer and 
Serpentor.

"Good job, Zardus!" he yelled, looking around nervously.

---

Double Punch was struck with all three charges, his exo-skeleton almost 
giving away.  Crashing to the ground he let out a small whine.  Getting up 
slowly, his modifications were complete.  He painfully raised his tail, 
seeing the outline of Scyther.  He fired a smal spray of acid at the outline.

---

Injector took an aim with both launchers at the unsuspecting Dark One and 
downed Breakdown, but a dozen shots struck him and knocked him back.

"Pieces of slag!" he yelled at the site of his cracked exo-skeleton.  He 
raised his left arm, firing off two stinger missiles SharpClaws and two from 
the other at Underground.

---

Manterror hit the ground after shots impacted with him.  He let out a yell of 
rage as he jumped to his feet.

---

Vehement looked to one missile, firing off two optic blasts at it, and turned 
to the other, firing off two rapid optic blasts at it, seeing from the corner 
of his optics their explosions.

He raised his left arm, firing two missiles at Hot Rod, and from the other 
firing two missiles at the Cybertronian Fire.  Twenty five shots struck 
Vehement dead on and sent him flying out of control downward.

---

Reflector raised both arms, firing two missiles each that prematurely 
exploded and took out all shots heading for him.  He couldn't see through the 
flames of his resulting defense, and so waited until he could see a target to 
attack.

---

Serpentor had gotten the upperhand and continued to pummel Nemesis' face 
until he heard a faint whistling sound.  Looking up he saw an object about 
the size of three charges.  "Right..." he said, jumping back and transforming 
to his snake mode and slithering away, noticing the slow retreat.

---

The bomb struck a few feet away from Nemesis Enforcer, sending him flying 
through the air without the use of his engines or wings, his body burned and 
scarred, the robot himself screaming.
